decisions.description: This decision element uses the "Skip Campaign Member Creation" boolean on Lead Staging, to check if we should create/update a standard Marketing Campaign Member. This Campaign Member is different from a Campaign Member who e.g. signed up for an event, in which case they are handled later in this flow and is handled through a more advanced process.
